thanathura - nadaththu niladhari ===================# rakiya karya bharaya - · purna sudusukam lath karmika shilpinge sewaya awashya nowana samanya adhikshana wada, nadaththu katayuthu saha aluthwadiya katayuthu sidu kirima· awashya awasthawaladi aluthwadiyawan sidukarana injineruwan saha karmika shilpinta sahaya wima· awashya awasthawaladi sulu parimanaye alankarana katayuthu saha samanya kamkaru sewawan labadima· upakarana, upanga saha godanagili sambandha gatalu ikmanin wartha kirima· pintharu saha sarasili, opa damima, waduwada, badu ehameha genayama, polowe saha wahalaye nadaththu katayuthu aadiya sidukirima· labadi athi upades walata anuwa, nisi kramaweda bhawitha karamin, adala lipilekhana katayuthu sampurna karamin adala wadakatayuthu niwaradiwa sidukirima· obage aarakshawa menma karya mandalaye, paribhogikayange ha amuththangeda aarakshawa thahawuru wana paridi wada kirima# illum kala yuthu aakaraya - ayadum karana thanathura eemel lipiye wishaya sandahan karana kotase sandahan kara obage ayadumpath
karmika nishpadana darshakayada athulathwa aarthika darshakanka gananawak janalekhana ha sankhyalekhana departhamenthuwa wisin sampadanaya karanu labe.

amali kiyanne tikak duk windapu kenek.ee mokada eyage appachchi sar kenek unata hondatama bimata abbahi wela hitiye.amma nars kenek.amali punchima dawas wala amma narsing skul eke trenin.dennama rajaye sewakayo unath appachchige bimathkama nisa loku diyunuwak thibune na..amali shishyathwe liyanakalma hitiye pol athu gedaraka.padam karaddi kuppi lampuwa peralila gini gaththa kipa sarayakma.bila awilla amma ekka appachchi randu karanakota amali kiri ammalage gedara ekka yanawa.amma trenin giyama appachchi yaluwo ekka bonawa.amalige loku mama awilla appachchita banala amaliwa ekkan yanawa.habayi appachchita hithunama samahara dawas walata mara hondayi.amaliwa nawala kawala andum sodala okkoma karanawa.ee tharam honda manussayek thawath naha.biwwe nathnam dewiyek.me nisa appachchige bima gana amali tharahak thiyagaththe na.habayi duken hitiye.
